caption.title: RNA-seq sample metadata including Sample ID, age, treatment (Condition), classification as per their IL-6 prenatal levels (Response), sequencer lane batch parameters (HiSeq Lane, Library barcodes), animal and litter parameters (Animal ID, Litter ID, Liter Size), animal sex inferred from Xist expression (Sex by Xist counts), fastq file name, and fastq file md5sum hash value (md5sum).
caption.p: Out of 74 samples, 73Â were tracked for the Litter ID (explained in the Comments).
